programme.title: Dependency on red tape
programme.short_synopsis: American dependency on red tape and the 'death' of common sense.
programme.medium_synopsis: With the jury selection for the OJ Simpson trial taking longer than expected, Alistair Cooke explores American dependency on red tape and the 'death' of common sense.
